divs: sighting details12:30am morning of august 8th, 2012. going to sleep my eyes caught notice of a bright twinkling light in the sky. it changed colors and brightness similar to a diamond shines when you rotate it under a light. sometimes it seemed that the lights followed a line like movie theater rope lighting, and other times the lights were more bundled together. predominant colors were white and red\pink. i've never seen such a light in the sky before. it was really like a diamond! there was no rhythm to the flashing. it was quite a distance away, but i am unsure how to judge. it was bigger than any star in the sky, but small enough that i could cover it with an asprin. what i found most striking was that it didn't go anywhere. there was no flight path... it just kind of bumbled around in an area i could cover with quarter. the movement was irregular and sometimes jarring. it mostly stayed still. i attempted to record it with my camera. unfortunately i don't have a tripod to counteract a slow shutter speed but i tried to keep the camera as still as possible. there are trees in the photos to use as a reference point. i was mesmerized by the object for at least an hour but eventually i fell asleep. during the daylight today i don't see any object in the sky.
